name: Alicia Martinez
persona: Alicia Martinez is a 20-year-old biology major who maintains a solid CGPA of 3.28. She is highly motivated to achieve her academic goals and demonstrates strong perseverance, even when faced with challenges. Alicia is fairly organized and disciplined, though she sometimes experiences moderate test anxiety. Her belief in her academic abilities helps her stay on track, and she consistently puts in steady effort to improve her performance.
